Action.author: jeffgarratt
Action.body: ~muralisr could you take a look at this?

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Moving to fabric-quality since this is a test improvement rather than a product bug that would impact users.

Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: Yes, it looks like this has been resolved for the core packages, at the time of its writing (August 2017) this was not the case. Closing.
